thread.title: SPR Consulting Officially Confirmed as a Platinum Sponsor of SharePoint Fest Chicago
thread.title_full: SPR Consulting Officially Confirmed as a Platinum Sponsor of SharePoint Fest Chicago - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SPR Consulting Officially Confirmed as a Platinum Sponsor of SharePoint Fest Chicago
text:
SharePoint Fest Chicago will be held at McCormick Place South December 8-10. 2015
Chicago, Illinois
SPR Consulting will help to bring this annual technology conference to Chicago, Illinois and will be a sponsor at the platinum level.
About SPR Consulting
A trusted partner to businesses for more than 40 years, SPR Consulting develops strategy and builds, integrates, tests and manages technologies that drive enterprise revenue and improve operational efficiency. With its expert consultants and innovative solutions, SPR develops scalable and flexible portals on premises and in the cloud. SPR improves access to information, company-wide collaboration and helps organizations more effectively connect with their customers. For more information on how SPR powers business with technology, visit http://www.spr.com .
Web Site: http://www.spr.com
About SharePoint Fest
Seven Great Reasons to Attend SharePoint Fest - Chicago:
1. The technical classes and seminars at SharePoint Fest are focused on practical techniques and practices you can put to work today.
2. Our expanded three-day SharePoint conference allows for more topics and additional expert speakers from the community.
3. Get answers to your questions in the classroom, or as you mingle with speakers and peers at coffee breaks or at the evening cocktail reception.
4. Bring a group of developers, IT pros and business teams to improve your whole organization's skills â€“ and get a discount to boot. Contact us for group registration discounts.
5. Attend the SharePoint sessions that work best for you. With more than 80 classes and workshops to choose from, you can make SharePoint Fest your own custom SharePoint training event.
6. See how the Microsoft SharePoint ecosystem is growing and evolving by speaking with technical experts from the local Microsoft field and diverse channels within the Microsoft Partner Network all in our exhibit hall.
7. Learn from the brightest minds in the SharePoint universe. Many of our speakers are either Microsoft engineers or have achieved Microsoft MVP or MCM status based on their in-depth knowledge of SharePoint.
Web Site: http://www.sharepointfest.com/Chicago
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13030510.htm
